title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, September 21, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Stephen King (1947). When asked why he writes, he said, "The answer to that is fairly simple — there was nothing else I was made to do."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Stephen King (1947). When asked why he writes, he said, "The answer to that is fairly simple — there was nothing else I was made to do."
